Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador conceded two quick goals in the second half of their opener, losing 2-1 to Venezuela.
The Reggae Boyz were narrowly defeated 1-0 by Mexico.
Ecuador lost their opening match for the third straight time in this tournament.
They are now winless in nine consecutive Copa America encounters.
Ecuador lost when leading at halftime for the first time since October 2021.
Jamaica has not won a single point in seven all-time Copa America affairs and has not scored a goal in that stretch.
Jamaica has not conceded a goal in the first 45 minutes of their matches so far in 2024, but they have been outscored by a 6-2 margin in the second half.
Jamaica has lost four out of five meetings with Ecuador, with their only positive result being a 0-0 draw in 2009.
